item.description:
Get your kayak, canoe, or any kind of boat you can lay hands on and come enjoy a Sunday morning paddle on the Nashua River! We'll put in at the downriver launch at the 119/111 bridge @ the Groton/Pepperell line and start going upstream to explore and check out the wildlife.

Pack a lunch/snacks, water, sunscreen, bugspray, camera and weather permitting, we'll have plenty of sunshine and fresh air for everyone! We'll stop somewhere along the way for a stretch and a bite.
As an FYI to all - be advised, there are no bathrooms at the launch.

Contact Bill - 603.557.6055 or bill@imaginetworks.com
item.name: Nashua River Paddle - upstream and back from Pepperell/Groton
